repair_time_options.description: general recovery, impedance, and mitigation factors optional inputs

include_impedance.description: logical switches for defining which impedance factors to consider in the assessment

engineering.description: flag to include engineering mobilization and design delays

contractor.description: flag to include contractor mobilization delays

mitigation.description: general impedance assessment inputs such as mitigation factors

is_essential_facility.description: is the building deemed as essential by the local jurisdiction

is_borp_equivalent.description: are the BORP, or BORP equivalent, post-earthquake strategies in place to limit inspection delays

is_engineer_on_retainer.description: is an engineer contracted to be on retainer in case of post-earthquake damage

is_contractor_on_retainer.description: is a contractor contracted to be on retainer in case of post-earthquake damage

funding_source.description: what is the source of funding for repair costs beyond that of the capital of the owner

capital.description: ratio of the building value that the onwer has immediately available for repairs

surge_factor.description: impedance and temporary repair time amplification factor based on a post-earthquake surge in demand for skilled trade and materials

functionality.description: optional method inputs for various recovery time and functionality limit state thresholds

door_racking_repair_day.description: days after the earthquake required to repaired all racked doorways

egress_threshold.description: ratio of building egress paths required for building safety and access, assuming an operational fire suppression system

egress_threshold_wo_fs.description: ratio of building egress paths required for building safety and access, assuming an non-operational fire suppression system

required_ratio_operating_hvac_main.description: ratio of hvac units, which service the entire building, required to maintain an operational hvac system

required_ratio_operating_hvac_unit.description: ratio of hvac units, which service an individual tenant unit, required to maintain an operational hvac system

required_ratio_operating_fs_drops.description: ratio of fire sprinkler drops, in a given tenant unit, required to maintain an operational hvac system

exterior_safety_threshold.description: damage theshold that triggers an exterior safety issue; threshold is defined in terms of the ratio of damaged area to perimeter area of a given tenant unit

interior_safety_threshold.description: damage theshold that triggers an interior safety issue; threshold is defined in terms of the ratio of damaged area to interior area of a given tenant unit

door_access_width_ft.description: width of door access zone, centerlined on the doorway, required for safe access. A safe door access zone must be free of falling hazards

building_model.description: general information about the building such as the number of stories and the building area

num_stories.description: number of stories in the building, does not include basement levels

total_area_sf.description: total interior area, in square feet, of the entire building

area_per_story_sf.description: interior area, in square feet, for each story in the building, starting from the lowest level

ht_per_story_ft.description: elevation height, in feet, for each story in the building, starting from the lowest level

edge_lengths.description: external length of two orthogonal sides of the building, in feet, for each story in the building, starting from the lowest level

struct_bay_area_per_story.description: length of the typical structural bay, from centerline to centerline, in feet, for each story in the building, starting from the lowest level

replacement_time_days.description: days after the earthquake required to replace the entire building, including impedance time

num_elevators.description: number of elevator shafts in the building

stairs_per_story.description: number of stairways on each story in the building, starting from the lowest level

tenant_unit.description: attributes and functional requirements of each tenant unit in the building

story.description: story where each tenant unit is located

area.description: floor area, in square feet, of the tenant unit

perim_area.description: perimeter area, in square feet, of the tenant unit

tenant_function_id.description: unique id key linking each tenant unit to its associated tenant function requirements

exterior.description: ratio of perimeter area of the tenant-unit with severe exterior damage that triggers loss of function

interior.description: ratio of interior area of the tenant-unit with falling hazards that triggers loss of function

occ_per_elev.description: max number of occupants per elevator required for function

elevator_story.description: max story where elevators are not required

electrical.description: is an operational electrical system required for tenant function

water.description: is an operational plumbing system required for tenant function

hvac.description: is an operational hvac system required for tenant function

total_num_occupants.description: total number of occuapnts (persons) that occupy this building

occupants_per_story.description: total number of occuapnts (persons) that occupy each story of this building, starting from the lowest level

damage.description: simulated damage, simulated repair time, and compoennt attribute data associated with each component's damages state in the building

comp_ds_info.description: various component attributes by damage state

fnc_filters.description: logical filters for various component attributes

story.description: simulated component damage, broken down by each tenant unit in the building

qnt_damaged.description: simulation of the quantity of damaged components in each component damage state

cost.description: simulated repair cost of each component's damage state

worker_days.description: simulated worker days required to repair each component's damage state

area_down.description: simulated area affected by each component's damage state

num_comps.description: simulated number of components associated with each component's damage state

qnt_damaged_side_1.description: simulated number of damaged component damage states associated with side 1

qnt_damaged_side_2.description: simulated number of damaged component damage states associated with side 2

qnt_damaged_side_3.description: simulated number of damaged component damage states associated with side 3

qnt_damaged_side_4.description: simulated number of damaged component damage states associated with side 4

repair_start_day.description: simulated days after the earthquake that repairs start on each component's damage state

repair_complete_day.description: simulated days after the earthquake that repairs finish on each component's damage state

damage_consequences.description: general impedance assessment inputs such as mitigation factors

red_tag.description: simulated logical of red tags, TRUE = building is red tagged

global_fail.description: simulated logical of global building failure, typically from excessive residual or collapse, TRUE = building has global failure

racked_stair_doors_per_story.description: simulated number of racked stairway doors per story

racked_entry_doors_side_1.description: simulated number of racked entry doors on one side of the building

racked_entry_doors_side_2.description: simulated number of racked entry doors on one side of the building

inpsection_trigger.description: simulated logical of inspection triggers, TRUE = building requires inspection

repair_cost_ratio.description: simulated building repair cost normalized by the replacement value

inspection_time.description: simulated building inspection time, in days

financing_time.description: simulated time to gather repair financing, in days

stability_time.description: simulated time to stabilize the building, in days

permitting_time.description: simulated time to gather required repair permits, for each system, in days

contractor_mobilization_time.description: simulated time to mobilize a contractor to make needed repairs, for each system, in days

engineering_mobilization_time.description: simulated time to mobilize an engineer to make needed re-designs, for each system, in days

engineering_design_time.description: simulated time for engineer to complete the needed re-designs, for each system, in days

functionality.description: simulated outputs of the performance based functional recovery methodology

utilities.description: simulated utility downtimes at this building site
